      • render

        public void render(int x,
          int y)
        Parameters:
        x - the location to draw the tile
        y - the location to draw the tile Render the tile at the specified location. Not to be called directly by the developer.

      • update

        Parameters:
        delta - the delta variable to be used in animation Update the tile's animation loop
